thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 3 of 693
thread.title: Holly
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Holly

author: Holly
title: Holly
text:
We were very pleased with our recent rental with Red Spot. They have an easy to navigate website and conveniently located inside the airport in Brisbane. I am used to renting cars in the US and Canada and this was by far the easiest rental I have had in years.
The car was eaxactly the one featured on the website and had very low mileage, so was in very good condition.
Thank you Red Spot for providing such a seamless rental experience for us!
